items.title: BBC News app
items.summary: Top stories, breaking news, live reporting, and follow news topics that match your interests

items.title: ElevenLabs now lets authors create and publish audiobooks on its own platform
items.summary: Voice AI company ElevenLabs is now letting authors publish AI-generated audiobooks on its own Reader app, TechCrunch has learned and the company confirmed. The announcement comes days after the company partnered with Spotify for AI-narrated audiobooks. ElevenLabs, which raised a $180 million mega-ro

items.title: Harvard dropouts to launch ‘always on’ AI smart glasses that listen and record every conversation
items.summary: After developing a facial-recognition app for Meta’s Ray-Ban glasses and doxing random people, two former Harvard students are now launching a startup that makes smart glasses with an always-on microphone.

items.title: Meta to add 100MW of solar power from US gear
items.summary: The social media company is adding another tranche of solar to power a new AI data center in South Carolina.

items.title: Gridware’s boxes literally listen to power lines to find outages
items.summary: Gridware's sensors listen for sounds that the company’s software has been trained to identify as different hazards to the grid.

items.title: Obvio’s stop sign cameras use AI to root out unsafe drivers
items.summary: American streets are incredibly dangerous for pedestrians. A San Carlos, California-based startup called Obvio thinks it can change that by installing cameras at stop signs -- a solution the founders also say won’t create a panopticon.

items.title: Gridcare thinks more than 100 GW of data center capacity is hiding in the grid
items.summary: Gridcare raised $13.3 million for its data platform that finds underutilized capacity on the electrical grid.

items.title: How one AI startup is helping rice farmers battle climate change
items.summary: Mitti Labs is working with The Nature Conservancy to expand the use of climate-friendly rice farming practices in India. The startup uses its AI to verify reductions in methane emissions.

items.title: Geothermal could power nearly all new data centers through 2030
items.summary: Geothermal resources have enormous potential to provide the sort of consistent power that data centers crave.

items.title: YouTube AI updates include auto dubbing expansion, age ID tech, and more
items.summary: In his annual letter, YouTube CEO Neal Mohan dubbed AI one of the company’s four “big bets” for 2025. The executive pointed to the company’s investments in AI tools for creators, including ones for video ideas, thumbnails, and language translation. The latter feature will rol

items.title: Who are climate-conscious consumers? Not who you’d expect, says Northwind Climate
items.summary: Rather than divide people into demographic buckets, Northwind Climate analyzes survey responses for behavioral clues.

items.summary: The company already has more than 12 gigawatts of capacity in its renewable power portfolio.

items.title: Nvidia thinks AI can solve electrical grid problems caused by AI

items.title: A private broom: Chennai’s conservancy woes

items.title: WBSSC to hold examination for teachers recruitment on September 7 amidst high security

items.title: Mumbai bids grand farewell to ‘Ganpati Bappa’ amid rains, bomb threat; over 18,000 idols immersed
